summary: Riot Games is an American video game company based in Los Angeles. It was started in 2006 by Brandon Beck and Marc Merrill to make the popular game League of Legends. They later created other games, like Valorant. The company was bought by Tencent in 2011. Riot Games also organizes esports tournaments and produced the TV series "Arcane." As of 2023, it has 20 offices worldwide. However, Riot has faced legal issues and criticism for a toxic work environment, including discrimination and harassment allegations.
title: Riot Games
